title: The summarie of English chronicles (lately collected and published) nowe abridged and continued tyl this present moneth of Marche, in the yere of our Lord God. 1566. By J.S.
author: Stow, John, 1525?-1605.
notes: An abridgement of Stow, John  "A summarie of Englyshe chronicles."
Includes a quartersheet with Stow's dedication to Sir Richard Champion, Lord Mayor--STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library, London, England.
